meaningMnemonic: Is there a <radical>reason</radical> you're in the <radical>bamboo</radical> grove? Why yes there is. It's so you can get yourself some bamboo and make a <kanji>flute</kanji> out of it.
readingMnemonic: You cut down the bamboo and whittle a <kanji>flute</kanji>. You start playing a song. You know the reason why. An alien spacecraft comes flying down and drops a box full of alien <reading>tech</reading> (てき) in front of you.
